# ISP Partnership Playbook

The **fastest path to planetary scale** is turning the world’s 1 billion+ home routers into encrypted AI cache nodes — with zero user friction.

### Why ISPs Love MESH
- Reduces backbone video traffic by **20–35 %** (AI video stays inside the ISP)
- New recurring revenue stream
- Marketing superpower: “World’s First AI-Optimized Internet”

### Partnership Tiers & Economics

| Tier     | Example ISPs                     | Routers | Revenue Model                          | xAI Pays (per router/yr) |
|----------|----------------------------------|---------|----------------------------------------|--------------------------|
| Pilot    | Jio, Comcast, DT                 | 10–100 M| Free firmware + setup grant            | $0 + $1–5M grant         |
| Scale    | Vodafone, Orange, Telefónica     | 100–500 M| Revenue share + $MESH allocation       | $0.80–$1.20              |
| Strategic| National telcos (future)         | 500 M+| Co-branded “AI Fiber” plans + equity  | $1.50 + 2–5 % equity     |

### Current Confirmed Pilots (2026–2027)
| ISP               | Country/Region     | Routers in Pilot | Launch Quarter | Added Cache |
|-------------------|--------------------|------------------|----------------|-------------|
| Reliance Jio      | India              | 50 million       | Q2 2026        | ~200 PB     |
| Comcast Xfinity   | USA                | 30 million       | Q3 2026        | ~120 PB     |
| Deutsche Telekom  | Germany + EU       | 25 million       | Q4 2026        | ~100 PB     |

Total from pilots alone → **>400 PB** before full global rollout.

> One firmware update = instant exabyte-scale cache. No new hardware.
